answers.answer: This is a mental health site and the question you are asking is about diabetes..you should address this question to an expert in the field...my general knowledge of medicine tells me that this is something you should defintely pursue.

question: I have an 11 year old son his height 5"4 his weight is 182lbs. He fasted the night before and I tested him with the Glucose monitor (finger *****) his reading was 122 is this bad?
title: Blood Sugar Test Results
